title: Napoleon and Josephine
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Napoleon and Josephine.

hook.text: He conquered Europe but couldn't conquer her heart. Napoleon's love letters to Josephine are desperately passionate.

buildup.text: Napoleon married Josephine in 1796 before his Italian campaign. He wrote her obsessively from every battlefield.

discovery.text: Josephine was unfaithful while he was away. When Napoleon learned, his romantic idealism shattered â€” but not his love.

twist.text: Napoleon divorced Josephine in 1809 because she couldn't produce an heir. His final words were reportedly: 'Josephine.'

climax.text: The man who conquered Europe could not get over one woman. Power means nothing against the vulnerability of love.

punchline.text: Napoleon's last word was 'Josephine.' Even emperors fall to love.

quiz.question: What were reportedly Napoleon's last words?
